revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Quest item | name = Communicator | class = Communicator | game = Strife | doomednum = 206 | convid = 176, 168, 172 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→Communicator
The Communicator is a dummy item from Strife. When this item is present in the inventory, Blackbird is able to send voice messages to the player by using the [[SendToCommunicator]] action special. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Communicator : {{Class|Inventory}} { +{{Flag|NOTDMATCH}} {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_COMMUNICATOR" // "Communicator" {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_COMM" {{Property|Inventory.PickupSound}} "misc/p_pkup" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_COMMUNICATOR" // "You picked up the Communicator." States { Spawn: COMM A -1 Stop } }
